sentences.en: A photographer had fused the lights, engulfing the entire house darkness.
sentences.cn: 一位摄影师把电灯的保险丝烧断了, 使整栋房子陷于黑暗当中.

sentences.en: A professional photographer had fused the lights, engulfing the entire house in darkness.
sentences.cn: 一位职业摄影师把保险丝烧断了使整所房子陷于黑暗当中.

sentences.en: Below the lithosphere is the rheosphere comprising partly fused peridotite.
sentences.cn: 岩石圈之下是由部分熔融的橄榄岩所组成的软流圈.

sentences.en: His music fused the rhythms of jazz with classical forms.
sentences.cn: 他的音乐把爵士乐的节奏和古典乐的形式结合在了一起。

sentences.en: His music of that period fused the rhythms of Jazz with classical forms.
sentences.cn: 他那个时期的音乐将爵士乐的韵律和古典音乐的形式融合在了一起。

sentences.en: It consists of two thin strips of dissimilar metals fused together.
sentences.cn: 它是由两条薄薄的不同金属片焊接在一起而构成.
雨水引发保险丝烧熔，使得灯泡都不亮了。

sentences.en: The aircraft came down in flames, and the heat fused most of the parts together into a solid mass.
sentences.cn: 飞机冒着火坠落了, 大多数部件因高温而熔成一团.

sentences.en: The bottom of the candle is fused with its holder.
sentences.cn: 蜡烛的底部和烛台熔合在一起.

sentences.en: The end of the wire had become accidentally fused with the switch.
sentences.cn: 电线末端意外地与开关接合在一起.
熔化的微粒子粘在一起。

sentences.en: The lights have fused; the whole place if in darkness.
sentences.cn: 电灯因保险丝烧断而熄灭了, 整个地区处于黑暗之中.

sentences.en: The wax from the two candles fused as they burned.
sentences.cn: 两根蜡烛上的蜡燃烧时熔化在一起.

sentences.en: The wire snapped at the wall plug and the light fused.
sentences.cn: 墙上插座的电线短路烧断了保险丝，电灯跟着灭了。

sentences.en: The wire snapped at the wall plug with a blue flash and the light fused.
sentences.cn: 墙上插头处的电线啪地发出一道蓝光，电灯的保险丝烧断了。

words.tran_cn: [化学][物]熔化的，熔凝的；装有保险丝的
